alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 18 at 1:23PM MDT until August 18 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall causing flash flooding of normally dry washes, recent burn scars, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An ongoing monsoon surge combined with increasing tropical moisture will bring an increased threat of flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
